title: Unprofessionalism at it's finest
body:
http://imgur.com/yMWHZvR

Freezer Flare received this message after posting in a 2 year thread that had already been necro'd, had 6 recent posts before his, and remains unlocked as I'm typing this. Seriously, here's the link, you can go ahead and post in it all you want, unless your name is Freezer Flare. Of course, this is assuming that this thread, which is the only one he could have possibly "necro'd" is the one he got banned for, which we don't really know because sometimes mods just refuse to even tell you what got you punished

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/GD/1ILE49rR-why-does-everyone-hate-yasuo

gj mods {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
